page.title: 11Recreation in Little Sodbury
page.content: There is not much entertainment in Little Sodbury End and Horton.There are no pubs and only two clubs - the social club and and the village club, the reason why there are not many clubs is it is mainly old people who live there.People stay at home,go on long walks,farm,or do gardening.That is why it looks very nice around these parts.Some people play golf for recreation.The golf club is normally very busy because people come from Bristol to play golf.About one-third of the population have moved here and some are very rich.People entertain their own family but sometimes in the year Little Sodbury End and Horton join up, and they have fetes and dances and people enjoy these activities.
